subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Did ya miss me!?

full_text:

Thank you!=A0 I did go stir crazy, played so much solitaire that I started =
dreaming about it hahaha.=A0 Good to be back...how ya been?
R-

--- On Thu,=
 8/21/08, Kristin Morris <ckmorris95@...> wrote:

From: Kristin M=
orris <ckmorris95@...>
Subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Did ya miss me!?
To=
: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Date: Thursday, August 21, 2008, 11:03 AM







=

Rhonda-Rhonda- Bo-Bond-Da! !=A0 Welcome back chickie.=A0 You are a very pa=
tient woman!=A0 I would=A2ve gone stir crazy without inet for that long.=A0=
 Anyway glad to have you back online!
k
=A0




From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .=
com [mailto: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com ] On Behalf Of Rhonda W
Sent: Thursda=
y, August 21, 2008 11:39 AM
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups .com
Subject: [EVP-ITC]=
 Did ya miss me!?
=A0








Im bacccccccck!

=A0

Sorry had dead modem an=
d had to wait for cable company to bring out a new one, took em 3 weeks!

=
=A0

So I did a some sessions while I waited, got some good responses and a=
ctually a few EVPs saying my name and that mom loves you....checked my mail=
 when I got my net back and got an email from the lady(Pat) that lived next=
 door to my mom and whom was a good friend of my mom.=A0 Theres a new famil=
y living on my moms property now, new mobile home and all...well they have =
a 3 year old son who talked to my moms friend a week or so ago...the little=
 boy was telling her about talking to a "man with ugly eyes" in his room an=
d how he was nice, he wasnt mean, Pat thinks(and I tend to agree)=A0that th=
e boy was talking to my mom...my mom had realllllly short hair and didnt ha=
ve pretty eyes, she had almost manly features as she got older and it would=
 be easy for a 3 year old to think she was male, specially at night in a se=
mi dark room.=A0 The boy didnt say what they talked about, but they had a c=
onversation and he wasnt scared...this happened on the day I got the EVPs i=
n
 my session.=A0 I wanna get a digi recorder now and see if they would all=
ow me to do a session at their place...would be very interesting to see wha=
t kind of responses Id get if I were on her property compared to sitting in=
 my place which is 20 miles or so away.

=A0

Anyways, just wanted to share=
 that with ya'll.=A0 Hope everyone is having a good week so far!=A0 

=A0

=
Rhonda
=A0
